name: Long ball
description: Long pass over 35 yards

name: Cross
description: A ball played in from wide areas into the box

name: Head pass
description: Pass made with a players head

name: Through ball
description: Ball played through for player making an attacking run to create a chance on goal

name: Free kick taken
description: Any free kick; direct or indirect

name: Corner taken
description: All corners. Look for qualifier 6 but excluding qualifier 2 for short corners

name: Players caught offside
description: Player who was in an offside position when pass was made.

name: Goal disallowed
description: Pass led to a goal disallowed for a foul or offside

name: Attacking Pass
description: A pass in the opposition's half of the pitch

name: Throw-in
description: Throw-in taken

name: Pass End X
description: The x pitch coordinate for the end point of a pass - See Appendix 11

name: Pass End Y
description: The y pitch coordinate for the end point of a pass - See Appendix 11

name: Chipped
description: Pass which was chipped into the air

name: Lay-off
description: Pass where player laid the ball into the path of a teammates run

name: Launch
description: Pass played from a player's own half up towards front players. Aimed to hit a zone rather than a specific player

name: Flick-on
description: Pass where a player has flicked the ball forward using their head

name: Pull Back
description: Player in opposition's penalty box reaches the by-line and passes (cuts) the ball backwards to a teammate

name: Switch of play
description: Any pass which crosses the centre zone of the pitch and in length is greater than 60 on the y axis of the pitch

name: Assist
description: The pass was an assist for a shot. The type of shot then dictates whether it was a goal assist or just key pass.

name: Length
description: The estimated length the ball has travelled during the associated event.

name: Angle
description: The angle the ball travels at during an event relative to the direction of play. Shown in radians.

name: 2nd assist
description: Pass was deemed a 2nd assist - created the opportunity for another player to assist a goal

name: Players on both posts
description: Assigned to event 6 indicating there were defensive players on both posts when a corner was taken

name: Player on near post
description: Assigned to event 6 indicating there was a defensive player on only the near post when a corner was taken

name: Player on far post
description: Assigned to event 6 indicating there was a defensive player on only the far post when corner was taken

name: No players on posts
description: Assigned to event 6 indicating there were no defensive players on either post when a corner was taken

name: In-swinger
description: Corner was crossed into the box swerving towards the goal

name: Out-swinger
description: Corner was crossed into the  box swerving away from the goal

name: Straight
description: Corner was crossed into the box with a straight ball flight

name: Blocked Pass
description: Similar to interception but player already very close to ball - instead of touch event in past. Or assigned to the pass to indicate it was blocked

name: Fair Play
description: Ball kicked out of play for injury etc

name: GK Start
description: Automated qualifier which appears on all GK passes after keeper collects ball with his hands and then puts it on the ground.

name: Indirect
description: Shows if indirect freekick is taken

name: Put Through
description: Gets assigned to the defending player who should have denied the pass. A “put through “ is always linked with a “failed to block” event on the defending teams side.

name: Tap
description: Freekick rolled - to enable exclusion from passing %

name: Kick Off
description: Starting pass - to enable exclusion from passing %

name: Fast Break
description: An offside pass which would have started a fast break

name: Blocked Pass
description: Similar to interception but player already very close to ball - instead of touch event in past. Or assigned to the pass to indicate it was blocked

name: Head
description: Any event where the player used their head such as a shot or a clearance

name: Left footed
description: Player shot with their left foot

name: Right footed
description: Player shot with right footed

name: Other body part
description: Shot was neither via a player's head or foot for example knee or chest

name: Regular play
description: Shot during open play as opposed to from a set play

name: Fast break
description: Shot occurred following a fast break situation

name: Set piece
description: Shot occurred from a crossed free kick

name: From corner
description: Shot occurred from a corner

name: Free kick
description: Shot occurred directly from a free kick

name: Corner situation
description: Pass or shot event in corner situation. 25 is used when the goal is direct from corner, 96 relates to 2nd phase attack.

name: Direct free
description: 26 will be used for shot directly from a free kick. 97 only used with Opta GoalData (game system 4) but not with full data.

name: Scramble
description: Goal where there was a scramble for possession of the ball and the defence had an opportunity to clear

name: Throw-in set piece
description: Shot came from a throw-in set piece

name: Assisted
description: Indicates that there was a pass (assist) from another player to set up the goal opportunity

name: Intentional assist
description: Shot from an intentional assist i.e. The assisting player intended the pass, no deflection etc

name: Related event ID
description: This will appear for goals or shots, the related event_id will be that of the assist and thus show the assisting player ID

name: 2nd related event ID
description: If there was a 2nd assist, i.e a pass to create the opportunity for the player making the assist. MLS and German Bundesliga 1 & 2.

name: Opposite related event ID
description: Used for any event where there is the same event for both teams with outcome 1 or 0. This relates the 2 event together, for example aerial duels

name: Penalty
description: When attempt on goal was a penalty kick. ALSO used on Event type 4 to indicate a penalty was awarded

name: Own goal
description: Own goal . Note: Use the inverse coordinates of the goal location

name: Volley
description: Shot on the volley (ball doesn't bounce before the shot)

name: Overhead
description: Shot via overhead kick

name: Half Volley
description: Shot on the half volley (hit immediately after the ball bounces) - NO LONGER USED

name: Diving Header
description: Shot where the player dives to head the ball - NO LONGER USED

name: Strong
description: Shot was subjectively classed as strong

name: Weak
description: Shot was subjectively classed as weak

name: Rising
description: Shot was rising in the air

name: Dipping
description: Shot was dipping towards the ground

name: Lob
description: Shot was an attempt by the attacker to play the ball over the goalkeeper and into the goal

name: One Bounce
description: Shot where the ball bounced once on its way towards the goal - NO LONGER USED

name: Few Bounces
description: Shot where the ball bounced several times on its way to the goal - NO LONGER USED

name: Swerve Left
description: Shot which swerves to the left - from attackers perspective

name: Swerve Right
description: Shot which swerves to the right - from attackers perspective

name: Swerve Moving
description: Shot which swerves in several directions

name: Deflection
description: Shot deflected off another player

name: Keeper Touched
description: Goal where the goalkeeper got a touch on the ball as it went in

name: Keeper Saved
description: Shot going wide or over the goal but still collected/saved by the goalkeeper with event type 15

name: Hit Woodwork
description: Any shot which hits the post or crossbar

name: Direct
description: Used with a free kick

name: Not past goal line
description: Shot missed which does not  pass the goal line

name: Big Chance
description: Shot was deemed by Opta analysts an excellent opportunity to score - clear cut chance eg one on one

name: Individual Play
description: Player created the chance to shoot by himself, not assisted. For example he dribbled to create space for himself and shot.

name: 2nd assisted
description: Indicates that this shot had a significant pass to create the opportunity for the pass which led to a goal

name: Own shot blocked
description: Player blocks an attacking shot  unintentionally from their teammate

name: GK X Coordinate
description: GK position when goal or shot hit post

name: GK Y Coordinate
description: GK position when goal or shot hit post

name: Temp_ShotOn
description: Shot has occurred but it is pending additional detail qualifiers from Opta.

name: Temp_Blocked
description: Block has occurred but it is pending additional detail qualifiers from Opta.

name: Temp_Post
description: Shot has hit the post but it is pending additional detail qualifiers from Opta.

name: Temp_Missed
description: Shot has missed but it is pending additional detail qualifiers from Opta.

name: Temp_MissNotPassedGoalLine
description: Shot has missed but not gone past the end line but it is pending additional detail qualifiers from Opta.

name: Follows a Dribble
description: A goal followed a dribble by the goalscorer

name: 1 on 1 Chip
description: Goal scored via a 1 on 1 chip over the goalkeeper

name: Back Heel
description: Goal scored via a back heel

name: Direct Corner
description: Shot or goal directly from a corner

name: Put Through
description: Gets assigned to the defending player who should have denied the shot. A “put through “ is always linked with a “failed to block” event on the defending teams side.

name: Fantasy Assist Type
description: Related Event to - PASS_LOST, BLOCKED_SHOT, ATTEMPT_SAVED, POST, FREE_KICK_WON, HANDBALL_WON, OWN_GOAL, PENALTY_WON

name: Fantasy Assisted By
description: Player making assist

name: Fantasy Assist Team
description: Team making assist

name: Duel
description: Indicates Blocked Shot is a duel

name: Small box-centre
description: Zone of the pitch - See appendix 13

name: Box-centre
description: Zone of the pitch - See appendix 13

name: Out of box-centre
description: Zone of the pitch - See appendix 13

name: 35+ centre
description: Zone of the pitch - See appendix 13

name: Small box-right
description: Zone of the pitch - See appendix 13

name: Small box-left
description: Zone of the pitch - See appendix 13

name: Box-deep right
description: Zone of the pitch - See appendix 13

name: Box-right
description: Zone of the pitch - See appendix 13

name: Box-left
description: Zone of the pitch - See appendix 13

name: Box-deep left
description: Zone of the pitch - See appendix 13

name: Out of box-deep right
description: Zone of the pitch - See appendix 13

name: Out of box-right
description: Zone of the pitch - See appendix 13

name: Out of box-left
description: Zone of the pitch - See appendix 13

name: Out of box-deep left
description: Zone of the pitch - See appendix 13

name: 35+ right
description: Zone of the pitch - See appendix 13

name: 35+ left
description: Zone of the pitch - See appendix 13

name: Left
description: Hit the left post or missed left

name: High
description: Hit crossbar or missed over

name: Right
description: Hit right post or missed right

name: Low left
description: Zone of the goalmouth - See appendix 12

name: High left
description: Zone of the goalmouth - See appendix 12

name: Low centre
description: Zone of the goalmouth - See appendix 12

name: High centre
description: Zone of the goalmouth - See appendix 12

name: Low right
description: Zone of the goalmouth - See appendix 12

name: High right
description: Zone of the goalmouth - See appendix 12

name: Blocked
description: Zone of the goalmouth - See appendix 12

name: Close left
description: Zone of the goalmouth - See appendix 12

name: Close right
description: Zone of the goalmouth - See appendix 12

name: Close high
description: Zone of the goalmouth - See appendix 12

name: Close left and high
description: Zone of the goalmouth - See appendix 12

name: Close right and high
description: Zone of the goalmouth - See appendix 12

name: Six yard blocked
description: Shot blocked on the 6 yard line

name: Saved off line
description: Shot saved on the goal line

name: Goal mouth y co-ordinate
description: Y Co-ordinate of where a shot crossed goal line - see Appendix 12

name: Goal mouth z co-ordinate
description: Z Co-ordinate for height at which a shot crossed the goal line - see Appendix 12

name: Far Wide Left
description: NO LONGER USED - Shot from wide left

name: Far Wide Right
description: NO LONGER USED - Shot from wide right

name: Blocked x co-ordinate
description: The x pitch coordinate for where a shot was blocked

name: Blocked y co-ordinate
description: The y pitch coordinate for where a shot was blocked

name: Out on sideline
description: Shot missed and went out on sideline

name: Hand
description: Handball

name: 6-seconds violation
description: Goalkeeper held onto the ball longer than 6 seconds resulting in a free kick

name: Dangerous play
description: A foul due to dangerous play

name: Foul
description: All fouls

name: Yellow Card
description: Player shown a yellow card

name: Second yellow
description: Player receives a 2nd yellow card which automatically results in a red card

name: Red card
description: Player shown a straight red card

name: Referee abuse
description: Card shown to player because of abuse to the referee

name: Argument
description: Card shown to player because of an argument

name: Fight
description: Card shown to player because of their involvement in a fight

name: Time wasting
description: Card shown to player for time wasting

name: Excessive celebration
description: Card shown to player for excessively celebrating a goal

name: Crowd interaction
description: Card shown to player because of contact or communication with the crowd

name: Other reason
description: Card shown for unknown reason

name: Back pass
description: Free kick given for an illegal pass to the goalkeeper which was collected by his hands or picked up

name: Dive
description: Free kick or card event; player penalised for simulation

name: Persistent infringement
description: Card shown to player for persistent fouls

name: Foul and abusive language
description: Card shown for player using foul language

name: Encroachment
description: Card shown for player who moves within 10 yards of an opponent's free kick

name: Leaving field
description: Card shown for player leaving the field without permission

name: Entering field
description: Card shown for player entering the field during play without referee's permission

name: Spitting
description: Card shown for spitting

name: Professional foul
description: Card shown for a deliberate tactical foul

name: Handling on the line
description: Card shown to an outfield player for using their hand to keep the ball out of the goal

name: Rescinded card
description: Referee rescind a card post match

name: No impact on timing
description: Player booked on bench but who hasn't played any minutes in the match

name: Dissent
description: Card shown when a player does not obey referee instructions

name: Off the ball foul
description: Foul committed by and on a player who is not in possession of the ball

name: Block by hand
description: Outfield player blocks a shot with their hand

name: Indirect
description: Shows if indirect foul is awarded

name: Obstruction
description: Foul committed is for obstruction

name: Unsporting Behaviour
description: Card shown for unsporting behaviour

name: Not Retreating
description: Card shown for player not retreating at a set-piece

name: Serious Foul
description: Card shown for player committing a serious foul

name: Aerial Foul
description: Foul committed aerially

name: Attempted Tackle
description: Foul committed by an attempted tackle

name: Denied goal-scoring opp
description: Foul committed by a player denying a goal-scoring opportunity

name: Own Shot Blocked
description: Player blocks an attacking shot unintentionally from their teammate

name: Fair Play
description: Ball kicked out of play for injury etc

name: Other Ball Contact Type
description: This is an automated extra event for DFL. It comes with a tackle or an interception and indicates if the player who made the tackle/interception retained the ball after this action or if the tackle/interception was a single ball touch (other ball contact with type “interception”, type “Defensive Clearance” or type “ TackleRetainedBall).

name: From shot off target
description: Used with Event 10. Indicates a shot was saved by the goalkeeper but in fact the shot was going wide and not on target

name: High claim
description: Event 11 Claim - Goalkeeper claims possession of a crossed ball

name: 1 on 1
description: When attacker was clear with no defenders between him and the goalkeeper (can be associated with 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15 or 16)

name: Deflected save
description: Event 10 Save; when goalkeeper saves a shot but does not catch the ball

name: Dive and deflect
description: Event 10 Save; when goalkeeper saves a shot while diving but does not catch the ball

name: Catch
description: Event 10 Save; when goalkeeper saves a shot and catches it

name: Dive and catch
description: Event 10 Save; when goalkeeper saves a shot while diving and catches it

name: Keeper Throw
description: Pass event - goalkeeper throws the ball out

name: Goal Kick
description: Pass event - goal kick

name: Punch
description: Clearance by goalkeeper where he punches the ball clear

name: Own Player
description: Shot saved by goalkeeper that was deflected by a defender

name: Parried safe
description: Goalkeeper save where shot is parried to safety

name: Parried danger
description: Goalkeeper save where shot is parried but only to another opponent

name: Fingertip
description: Goalkeeper save using his fingertips

name: Caught
description: Goalkeeper catches the ball

name: Collected
description: Goalkeeper save and collects possession of the ball

name: Standing
description: Goalkeeper save while standing

name: Diving
description: Goalkeeper save while diving

name: Stooping
description: Goalkeeper saves while stooping

name: Reaching
description: Goalkeeper save where goalkeeper reaches for the ball

name: Hands
description: Goalkeeper saves with his hands - REPLACED by 267-272

name: Feet
description: Goalkeeper save using his feet - REPLACED by 267-272

name: Scored
description: Goalkeeper event - shots faced and not saved resulting in goal

name: Saved
description: Goalkeeper event - shots faced and saved

name: Missed
description: Goalkeeper event - shot faced which went wide or over. Did not require a save.

name: GK hoof
description: Goalkeeper drops the ball on the ground and kicks it long towards a position rather than a specific player

name: Gk kick from hands
description: Goalkeeper kicks the ball forward straight out of his hands

name: Low
description: Indicates a low goal kick

name: Right Arm
description: Saved via right arm

name: Left Arm
description: Saved via left arm

name: Both Arms
description: Saved via both arms

name: Right Leg
description: Saved via right leg

name: Left Leg
description: Saved via left leg

name: Both Legs
description: Saved via both legs

name: Hit Right Post
description: Hit right post after save

name: Hit Left Post
description: Hit left post after save

name: Hit Bar
description: Hit bar after save

name: Over-arm
description: Indicates over-arm throw out from keeper

name: Unchallenged
description: Goalkeeper smothers ball but is not under any challenge

name: Last line
description: When a player makes a defensive action and they are the last person between the opponent and the goal

name: Def block
description: Defender blocks an opposition shot. Shown with event 10.

name: Out of play
description: Tackle or clearance event sent the ball out of play

name: Leading to attempt
description: A player error, event 51, which leads to an opponent shot on goal

name: Leading to goal
description: A player error, event 51, which lead to an opponent scoring a goal

name: Blocked cross
description: Clearance; cross is blocked

name: By Wall
description: Freekick situation blocked by wall - need associated outfielder hit

name: Defensive
description: Indicates a defensive duel

name: Offensive
description: Indicates an offensive duel

name: Home Team Possession
description: Possession % in last 5 mins

name: Away Team Possession
description: Possession % in last 5 mins

name: Out of Play Secs
description: Amount of time the ball was out of play in the last 5 minutes

name: Involved
description: This will show all players in the starting line up and available as a substitute

name: Injury
description: Substitution, event 18, because of injury

name: Tactical
description: Substitution, event 18 for tactical reasons

name: Player position
description: Goalkeeper, Defender, Midfielder, Forward or Substitute. These are the playing positions associated with each player for the specific match they are playing in.

name: Jersey number
description: This will be shown for substitutions, line ups, line up changes

name: Team formation
description: See appendix 14

name: Team player formation
description: Player position within a formation - See appendix 14

name: Formation slot
description: Formation position of a player coming on - see appendix 14

name: Captain
description: ID of the player who is the team captain

name: Team kit
description: Kit of the team

name: Coach ID
description: ID of the team coach

name: Coach Types
description: Shows Coaches and involved roles

name: Official position
description: Referee, Linesman#1, Linesman#2, Forth official

name: Official ID
description: Unique ID for the official

name: Referee stop
description: Referee stops play

name: Referee delay
description: Delay in play instructed by referee

name: Referee Injury
description: Referee injured

name: Offside
description: Contentious decision relating to offside

name: Goal Line
description: Contentious decision relating to ball crossing the goal line

name: Injured player id
description: ID of the player who is injured and causing a delay in the game

name: Weather problem
description: Bad weather stops or interrupts play

name: Crowd trouble
description: Trouble within the crowd stops or delays play

name: Fire
description: Fire with the stadium stops or delays play

name: Object thrown on pitch
description: Object throw from the crowd lands on the pitch and delays play

name: Spectator on pitch
description: Spectator comes onto the pitch and forces a delay in play

name: Awaiting officials decision
description: Given to an event/delay where the referee still has to make a decision

name: Referee injury
description: Referee sustained injury causing stoppage in play

name: Suspended
description: Game is has not finished but is suspended

name: Resume
description: Game has resumed after being suspended mid-way through on a previous date

name: Drinks Break
description: Game delayed due to drinks break

name: End cause
description: Golden goal, weather, crowd, insufficient players, floodlight failure, frozen pitch, waterlogged pitch, other, unknown

name: Zone
description: Area on the pitch - see appendix 13

name: End type
description: End of the match

name: Direction of play
value: Right to Left or Left to Right
description: Event type 32 - Actual direction of play in relation to TV camera. X/Y coordinates however are ALWAYS all normalized to Left to Right.

name: Deleted event type
description: An event which should be removed. Value will show the ID of this event

name: Player not visible
description: Broadcast footage showing replay and not live footage - this event is what Opta analysts believe occurred.

name: Game end
description: The game is finished

name: Overrun
description: TAKE ON (3) - where a player takes on an opponent but the ball runs away from them out of play or to an opponent.

name: Post-match complete
description: Opta post match quality control has been completed on this match

name: Minutes
description: Number of minutes of injury time given by the referee

name: Temperature
description: Very Cold, Cold, Pleasant, Warm, Hot - NO LONGER USED

name: Conditions
description: Wind, rain, fog, snow/hail

name: Field Pitch
description: Water logged pitch, wet pitch, damp pitch, normal pitch, dry

name: Lightings
description: Flood lights, bad visibility, natural lights

name: Attendance Figure
description: Number of people in crowd

name: Open Roof
description: Whether the roof is open

name: Air Humidity
description: The air humidity

name: Air Pressure
description: The air pressure

name: Sold Out
description: Whether the game is sold out

name: Celsius degrees
description: The temperature

name: Floodlight
description: Whether the game is floodlit
